com.myscript.atk.sltw

Interface SingleLineTextWidgetApi.OnUserScrollListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SingleLineTextWidgetApi

    public static interface SingleLineTextWidgetApi.OnUserScrollListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when the user is scrolling the writing area. The user can scroll the writing area using the scrollbar or by hovering the stylus over the display.

    These callbacks are not called when the writing area is scrolling on its own, due to auto-scrolling or when the application explicitly calls any of the provided scrolling methods.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onUserScroll()
      Called when the user is scrolling the writing area.
      void onUserScrollBegin()
      Called when the user begins a scrolling sequence.
      void onUserScrollEnd(boolean scrolledAtEnd)
      Called when the user ends a scrolling sequence.

    • Method Detail

      • onUserScrollBegin

        void onUserScrollBegin()
        Called when the user begins a scrolling sequence.

      • onUserScrollEnd

        void onUserScrollEnd(boolean scrolledAtEnd)
        Called when the user ends a scrolling sequence.

        When scrolling stops, the widget detects whether the writing area is scrolled at the end of the text and informs the application through the scrolledAtEnd boolean value.

        The user can impact the current mode of the widget (insertion/correction) by scrolling the writing area. If the widget is currently in insertion mode and the user has scrolled back into the text, the application should switch to correction mode by calling the SingleLineTextWidgetApi.setCorrectionMode() function. Similarly, if the widget is currently in correction mode and the user has scrolled at the end of the text, the application should switch to insertion mode by calling the SingleLineTextWidgetApi.setInsertionMode(int) function and setting the insertion index at the end of the text.

        The widget does not change the current working mode automatically.

        Parameters:
        scrolledAtEnd - true if the writing area is scrolled at the end of the text, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        SingleLineTextWidgetApi.isInsertionMode(), SingleLineTextWidgetApi.setInsertionMode(int), SingleLineTextWidgetApi.setCorrectionMode()

      • onUserScroll

        void onUserScroll()
        Called when the user is scrolling the writing area.
